main.name: Shelby Anne Rothman
main.description: I come from a background of Cultural Theory and design, dedicated to learning continuously, problem solving, and creating user-friendly applications with clean code
main.bio: I am curious, open-minded, empathetic, and dedicated to continuous learning. I am Effectual at integrating creativity, problem solving, and attention to detail to develop clean code and user-friendly applications. I am sharply intelligent, flexible, and a team-player with great communication skills. My interests outside of computer programming and web development are art, yoga, dogs, music, skateboarding, and graphic novels.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for more information

education.description: A 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: Implemented office/studio procedures, supervised projects, preparing reports, payroll, handling phone calls and correspondence, maintaining a good relationship with customers, and organizing the overall flow of the, students, teachers, studio and office.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
